titleInfo.title: PZ 6384/37 'Statement of MEMORIALS withheld by the Govt of India'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 31; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file consists of correspondence and statements concerning memorial petitions relating to subjects dealt with in the Government of India, External Affairs Department, and addressed to His Majesty the King Emperor or His Majesty's Secretary of State for India, which were withheld by the Government of India each quarter. The papers were sent from the Secretary to the External Affairs Department to the Secretary to the India Office, External Department.The file includes a divider which gives a list of correspondence references contained in the file by year. This is placed at the back of the correspondence.
